title: League Of Legends 6th Birthday
body: So if some of you don't know League is turning 6 years old on the 27th (I'm pretty sure) so I thought it would be cool if riot did something like change the login screen? I think it would be cool to have all of Leagues champions standing together with the original login screens music playing!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=SkeletorTheMyaah,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=i7jNu7yf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-19T01:52:14.319+0000)
>
> I'll bring the cake

Don't forget the candles

{{champion:63}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:63}} 

Do Brands count? Either way I got 6 of 'em, there's your candles :p
Depends if you count the closed beta, because it's realistically 6 and a half.

it'll be cool if riot asks does a vote for an expired feature to return for one day on LoL's birthday- I'd definitely vote for turret-dodge Jax one more time...
